column3: Description
column4: Hard Description (Note: appended onto the normal description in an enclosing Red color tag and after a newline)

column3: (Targets Any Enemy) Bite a single target to deal normal damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Swoop down and hit a single target to deal normal damage.
(Targets Front) Bite a single target to deal normal damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Bite a single target to deal normal damage and then start flying.
(Targets Any Enemy) Slash a single target to deal normal damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Slash a single target twice to deal normal damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Swoop down and hit a single target twice to deal normal damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Swoop down and hit a single target three times to deal normal damage.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Self) Get Focus after being attacked.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Attacker) Strike back with a single normal hit after being attacked.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Self) Get Absorb after being attacked.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Self) Heal yourself for a small amount after being attacked.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Self) Get Focus and Absorb after being attacked.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets All Allies) Give Focus to all allies after being attacked.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets All Enemies) Apply Sunder to all targets.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Self) Become Ethereal for 1 turn after being attacked.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets All Allies) Give Absorb to all allies after being attacked.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets All Allies) Give Defense Up to all allies after being attacked.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets All Allies) Give Attack Up to all allies after being attacked.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> Tail whip a single target to deal Earth damage. (Earth damage is 66% stronger if you took damage this turn.)
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> Swoop down and hit a single target. Get some Focus at the end of your turn.
(Targets Any Enemy, Targets Any Ally) Bite a single target then start flying, then heal a single ally.
(Targets Any Enemy) Slam down onto a single target.
(Targets Any Enemy) Slam down onto all targets.
(Targets Self) Dig down and become untargettable for a single turn.
column4: (Higher difficulties: Heal for a small amount of HP and get a small amount of Absorb.)

column3: (Targets Any Enemy) Emerge from the ground and slam down onto all targets.
(Targets Any Enemy) Slam down onto a single target. Summon a Sunnybud and a Sunflower if there is space. If there is no space, give both of them some Focus.
column4: (Higher difficulties: Allies gain slightly more Focus and some Absorb.)

column3: (Targets Any Enemy) Slam down onto all targets.
(Targets Self) Absorb solar energy to gain a large amount of Focus. Summon a Sunnybud and a Sunflower if there is space. If there is no space, give both of them some Focus.
column4: (Higher difficulties: Allies gain slightly more Focus and some Absorb.)

column3: (Targets Any Enemy) Roar powerfully to hit all targets and give all allies some Focus.
column4: (Higher difficulties: User gains some Absorb and heals a small amount.)

column3: (Targets Any Enemy) Swoop down and hit a single target and then heal a single ally or all allies for a smaller amount.
(Targets Any Enemy) Bite a target and cover them with pollen to inflict Dizzy.
(Targets Attacker) Bite a target and cover them with pollen to inflict Dizzy. Counter still happens even if they are reduced to 0 hp.
column4: (Higher difficulties: Inflicts 2 turns of Dizzy instead of 1.)

column3: (Targets Any Enemy) Fling a poison droplet at a single target to deal Earth damage and inflict Poison.
(Targets Attacker) Fling a poison droplet at a single target to deal Earth damage and inflict Poison. Counter still happens even if they are reduced to 0 hp.
column4: (Higher difficulties: Inflicts 2 turns of Poison instead of 1.)

column3: (Targets Any Enemy) Throw a thorn to deal normal damage to a single target
(Targets All Enemies) Shoot a cloud of pollen from a flower to deal Earth damage and inflict Dizzy.
(Targets All Enemies) Throw a sharp flower to deal Earth damage to all targets.
(Targets Self) (Activates at or below 2/3 health) Summon a Burrow Trap in front and a Sundew behind the user, heal for 10 HP and raise a Vine Platform to stand on.
(Targets Any Enemy) Send a vine to deal normal damage to a single target.
(Targets All Enemies) Create a large cloud of pollen from a flower to deal Earth damage and inflict Dizzy.
(Targets All Enemies) Grow many vines in order to deal Earth damage to all targets.
(Activates when the Vine Platform is destroyed) Fall down and permanently increase the user's defense by 1.
column4: (Higher Difficulties: A Burrow Trap is summoned in front.)

column3: (Targets Any Enemy) Slam down onto a single target to deal Normal damage.
(Targets All Enemies) Slam onto all targets to deal Normal damage.
(Targets Front Enemy) Prepare to grab an enemy. (Cannot grab if there is only 1 player left alive or not grabbed)
(Targets Grab Target) Grab the enemy chosen by Telegraph and hold them until the Giant Vine is destroyed or the character is reduced to 0 hp.
(Targets Grabbed Character) Hurt the grabbed character for a moderate amount of Normal damage.
(Activates when the Giant Vine or the grabbed character is at 0 hp) Throw the grabbed character to release them.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Any Enemy) Slash a single target to deal Earth Damage. (Occurs instead of Slam.)
(Targets Any Enemy) Throw two thorns to deal normal damage to a single target
(Targets All Enemies) Shoot a cloud of pollen from a flower to deal Earth damage and inflict Dizzy.
(Targets All Enemies) Throw a sharp flower to deal Earth damage to all targets.
(Targets Self) (Activates at or below 2/3 health) Summon two Giant Vines, heal for 10 HP and raise a Vine Throne to stand on to become untargettable until the Throne is destroyed.
(Targets Any Enemy) Send two vines to deal normal damage to a single target.
(Targets All Enemies) Create a large cloud of pollen from a flower to deal Earth damage and inflict Dizzy.
(Targets All Enemies) Grow many vines in order to deal Earth damage to all targets.
(Activates when both Giant Vines are destroyed in Phase 2) Summon a new Giant Vine. The summon position of the Giant Vine will alternate if this is repeatedly triggered.
(Activates when the Vine Platform is destroyed) Fall down and permanently increase the user's defense by 1, and summon a Giant Vine.
column4: (Higher Difficulties: Two Giant Vines are spawned instead of one.)

column3: (Targets Any Enemy) Slash a single target. May feint before actually striking.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Attacker) Counter an attack made on any ally.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets All Enemies) Deal Electric damage to all targets and inflict Enervate on all targets.
(Targets Lowest Health Enemy) Sling a rock at the lowest HP target. (Usable while grounded, will fly up before the move.)
(Targets Attacker) Sling a rock at the attacker to deal Electric damage and inflict Paralyze.
(Targets Any Enemy) Stab a target with thorns to deal Electric damage and inflict Paralyze. Also fall down to the ground after the move.
(Targets Any Enemy) Bite a single target to deal normal damage and paralyze them.
(Targets Any Enemy) Stomp a single target.
(Targets Any Enemy) Jump high and splash a single target to deal Water damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Shoot a ball of water at a single target to deal Water damage. (This will prioritize the target that will take the most damage.)
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Any Enemy) Stomp on a single target to deal weak Water damage but inflict Defense Down 2 for 3 turns.
(Targets Self) Get 3 Focus and 3 Absorb.
(Targets All Enemies) Shoot a large ball of water to deal Water damage to all enemies.
(Targets Any Enemy) Zap a single target to deal Electric damage and inflict Paralyze
(Targets Any Enemy) Lob a ball of water at a single target to deal Water damage and inflict Sleep
(Targets Any Enemy) Send a bubble towards the target to deal Water damage and inflict Sleep for 2 turns. (Usable while grounded, will fly up before the move.)
(Targets All Allies) Gives 1 Focus to all allies.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Any Sleeping Enemy) Bite a sleeping target to deal strong Dark damage.
(Targets All Enemies) Breathe fire to deal Fire damage to all targets.
(Targets All Enemies) Roar powerfully to hit all targets to deal normal damage and inflict Berserk.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Self) Get 1 Focus after being attacked. (If the incoming damage is Water or Light type, get 2 Focus instead.)
(Targets Any Enemy) Breathe a fireball that hits a single target and deals Fire damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Hits a single target with Electric damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Hits a single target with Water damage and inflicts Defocus.
(Targets All Enemies) Lick with a long fiery tongue to deal Fire damage to all targets.
(Targets Any Enemy) Spread fire by flapping your wings to deal Fire damage to all targets. (Usable while grounded, will fly up before the move.)
(Targets Lowest Health Enemy) Shoot spores at the weakest target to deal Dark damage.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Attacker) Shoot a cloud of spores at the attacker to deal Dark damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Stab the target to deal normal damage and inflict Poison.
(Targets All Enemies) Shoot out many spikes to deal moderate Dark damage and inflict Defocus and Sunder on all targets. However, the user gets Defocus and Sunder.
(Targets All Enemies) Shoot a spore cloud to deal normal damage to all targets and inflict Endurance Down. (Usable while grounded, will fly up before the move.)
(Targets Any Ally) Make an ally Ethereal for 2 turns, making it impossible to hit them with non-Light damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Bite a target to heal them. However, the target is also inflicted with Poison. (Usable while grounded, will fly up before the move.)
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Activates when the Hoarder Fly dies) (Targets All Allies) Heals all allies.
(Targets Any Enemy) Stab a target to deal Electric damage and inflict Paralyze and Sunder.
(Targets Highest Health Enemy) Deal damage and drain health from the target.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Self) Apply Ethereal to yourself for 2 turns.
(Targets Highest Health Enemy) Peck the target twice to deal normal damage.
(Targets All Enemies) Screech loudly to deal weak Light damage to all targets and inflict Freeze.
(Targets All Allies) Applies Defense Up 2 for 3 turns to all allies.
(Targets Any Enemy) Spit at the target to deal Water damage and then heal an ally or all allies for a smaller amount. (Usable while grounded, will fly up before the move.)
(Targets All Enemies) Screech loudly to deal strong Light damage to all targets and inflict Dizzy. (Usable while grounded, will fly up before the move.)
(Targets All Allies) Applies 1 Focus to all allies.
column4: (Higher Difficulties: Also applies Parry Aura for 3 turns.)

column3: (Targets All Enemies) Blast with your horn to deal Light damage to all targets.
(Targets All Enemies, Target All Allies) Shine your lantern brightly to deal weak Light damage to all targets and apply Defense Up 2 for 3 turns to all allies.
(Targets Self) Charge up for a Charge Slice.
column4: (Higher Difficulties: Also applies 1 Focus to all allies.)

column3: (Targets Front) Slice the target hard to deal normal damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Slash a single target twice to deal normal damage. Fly up after attacking.
(Targets Self) Charge up for a Quad Slash. Become grounded if you are airborne.
column4: (Higher Difficulties: Also applies 1 Focus to all allies.)

column3: (Targets Front) Hit the target with four slashes to deal normal damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Slam down on the target to deal normal damage and inflict Sunder.
(Targets Any Enemy) Shoot a fireball at the target to deal Fire damage and inflict Berserk.
(Targets Any Enemy) Stab a target with your tongue to deal Dark damage and inflict Poison.
<color,blue>(Not used in higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Self) Apply Ethereal to yourself for 2 turns.
(Targets Any Enemy) Stare strongly at an enemy to deal weak Light damage. (Prefers targetting Ethereal targets.)
(Targets Any Enemy) Slash a target with a claw strike to deal Electric damage and inflict Paralyze and Sunder.
(Targets Any Enemy) Whip your tail around to hit a target for strong normal damage.
(Targets All Enemies) Rush through all targets to hit each target twice.
(Targets Self) Saws become active or inactive (the opposite of their previous state).
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Attacker) When going from the inactive to the active state, hit the attacker with a dark cloud for weak Dark damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Slap your body into a target to deal moderate normal damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Hide in your shell to draw in electric charge and become more defensive.
(Targets All Enemies) Hit all targets for massive Electric damage.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Attacker) While in your shell, counter attacks by rolling into the target for weak normal damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Drill into the target with your beak to quickly deal normal damage 4 times.
(Targets Any Enemy) Slam down on the target to deal normal damage.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Any Enemy) A flashy stomp that deals Light damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Jump and ram into the target to deal normal damage. Has different timing variations.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Any Enemy) Jump into a target from afar to deal weak Water damage.
(Targets Any Enemy) Swing a tentacle into the target to deal weak Light damage.
(Targets Self) Fortify yourself to give yourself Absorb and Focus.
(Targets Any Enemy) Toss a bubble from a tentacle to deal moderate Water damage to one target.
(Targets All Enemies) Toss a barrage of bubbles to deal moderate Water damage to all targets.
(Targets Any Enemy) Summon a large lightning bolt to deal massive Electric damage to one target.
(Targets Self) Give yourself Attack Up 2 indefinitely, 4 Focus and heal for 4 hp.
column4: (Higher Difficulties: Gives Attack Up 3 instead of 2)

column3: (Targets Self) Assume a more defensive form if hit by Light, Water or Air attacks, or a more offensive form if hit by other damage types. (The Ice form is the most defensive and the Cloud form is the most offensive.)
(Targets Any Enemy) Slash with your claw to deal normal damage to a single target 3 times. First hit is weaker but the second and third hits are stronger.
(Targets All Enemies) Create a blast from your claw to deal Dark damage and inflict Sleep and Attack Down to all targets.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets Attacker) Hit an attacker with your claw to deal weak normal damage and remove their buffs .
(Targets Any Enemy) Slap your body into a target to deal moderate normal damage.
(Targets All Enemies) Stare strongly at all enemies to deal strong Light damage and inflict Freeze and Defense Down.
(Targets All Allies) Heal all allies for a small amount.
(Targets All Enemies) Remove all positive effects from all enemies, and inflict Defocus 1 on them. Used only when all allies are at max HP.
column4: (Higher Difficulties: Sometimes used instead of Healing Breath.)

column3: (Targets All Enemies) Explode to deal high Normal damage to all enemies, dying in the process. (Used when alone, or when all allies are also Crystal Clams.)
column4: (Higher Difficulties: Used on turn 4 and later.)

column3: (Targets All Enemies, Targets All Allies) Spread Ruby mist around the battlefield to deal weak Fire damage to all targets and then apply Attack Up to all allies.
(Targets All Enemies, Targets All Allies) Spread Sapphire mist around the battlefield to deal very weak Water damage to all targets and then apply Defense Up to all allies.
(Targets All Enemies, Targets All Allies) Spread Emerald mist around the battlefield to deal weak Earth damage to all targets and then heal all allies.
(Targets Any Enemy) Throw a seed from your head flower to deal weak normal damage and inflict Drain Sprout.
column4: (Higher Difficulties: Heal 4 HP when using this move.)

column3: (Targets Any Enemy) Toss a seed from your tail flower to deal strong Electric damage and inflict Poison and Bolt Sprout.
column4: (Higher Difficulties: Heal 4 HP when using this move.)

column3: (Targets All Enemies) Summon a massive wave to deal Water damage to all targets and inflict Attack Down.
(Targets All Enemies) Blow a cloud of fog to deal Dark damage to all targets and inflict Endurance Down.
(Targets All Enemies) Summon a storm of fast moving leaves to deal Earth damage to all targets and inflict Defense Down.
(Targets All Enemies) Stare down all enemies to deal weak Light damage.
(Targets Lowest Health Enemy) Stare down the weakest target to deal strong Dark damage.
column4: (Higher Difficulties: Inflicts Seal, preventing you from gaining buffs.)

column3: (Targets Attacker) Stare down your attacker to deal moderate Dark damage.
(Targets Self, Targets Any Ally) Coil around to apply Defense Up 1 indefinitely and Absorb 3 to yourself and one ally.
(Targets Any Enemy) Slam down on one target to deal strong normal damage.
column4: (Higher Difficulties: Inflicts Sticky, preventing you from using items.)

column3: (Targets Any Enemy) Wrap around a target to drain their health with 3 normal damage hits.
<color,red>(Only on higher difficulties)</color> (Targets All Enemies) Create a vortex that deals normal damage, inflicts Drain Sprout and drains some health and energy from all targets.
